TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ConstructorInfo extends System.Reflection.MethodBase implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo
Public MustInherit Class ConstructorInfo Inherits MethodBase Implements _ConstructorInfo
public ref class ConstructorInfo abstract : System::Reflection::MethodBase, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo
type ConstructorInfo = class inherit MethodBase interface _ConstructorInfo

Docs.summary: Discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `ConstructorInfo` 用來探索的建構函式以及對於叫用建構函式的屬性。 物件可由呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke%2A>上`ConstructorInfo`傳回由<xref:System.Type.GetConstructors%2A>或<xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A>方法<xref:System.Type>物件。
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> 繼承自<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>數個成員，例如<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsGenericMethod%2A>，可用來檢查泛型方法。 在.NET Framework 2.0 版的建構函式不可以是泛型，因此這些成員傳回`false`或`null`。
## Examples 下列範例會使用`ConstructorInfo`與<xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A>和<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>來尋找符合指定的搜尋條件的建構函式。
[!code-cpp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CPP/type_getconstructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CS/type_getconstructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/VB/type_getconstructor3.vb#1)]

Docs.permission: 針對繼承者完全信任。 這個類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。
Docs.threadsafe: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

block.para: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員多載： 。

MemberSignature.Value: public object Invoke (object[] parameters);
.method public hidebysig instance object Invoke(object[] parameters) cil managed
Public Function Invoke (parameters As Object()) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Invoke(cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters);
override this.Invoke : obj[] -> obj

Docs.param: An array of values that matches the number, order and type (under the constraints of the default binder) of the parameters for this constructor. If this constructor takes no parameters, then use either an array with zero elements or , as in Object[] parameters = new Object[0]. Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type. For reference-type elements, this value is . For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or , depending on the specific element type.
Docs.summary: Invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.
Docs.returns: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該數目、 類型與這個執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。 然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端具有存取權限，並確認參數是否有效。
完全信任程式碼會忽略存取限制。 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。
> [!NOTE] > 若要建立沒有執行個體建構函式的實值類型的執行個體，請使用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>方法。
這是便利的方法，如下列多載版本，使用預設值。 無法覆寫這個方法。
> [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫端被授與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，如果非公用成員的授權集僅限於呼叫者的授與集或子集合類別。 (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

Docs.exception: The class is abstract. -or- The constructor is a class initializer.

In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, , instead. The constructor is private or protected, and the caller lacks .
The array does not contain values that match the types accepted by this constructor.
The invoked constructor throws an exception.
An incorrect number of parameters was passed.
Creation of , , and types is not supported.
The caller does not have the necessary code access permission.
Docs.permission: 叫用時晚期繫結透過機制例如。 列舉型別相關聯： 。

Docs.param: One of the values that specifies the type of binding.
A that defines a set of properties and enables the binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members using reflection. If binder is , then is used.

An array of type used to match the number, order and type of the parameters for this constructor, under the constraints of binder. If this constructor does not require parameters, pass an array with zero elements, as in Object[] parameters = new Object[0]. Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type. For reference-type elements, this value is . For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or , depending on the specific element type.
A used to govern the coercion of types. If this is , the for the current thread is used.
Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, invokes the constructor reflected by this with the specified arguments, under the constraints of the specified .
Docs.returns: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該數目、 類型與這個執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。
然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端沒有存取權限，以及參數是否正確數目、 順序和類型。
完全信任程式碼會忽略存取限制。 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。
> [!NOTE] > 若要建立沒有執行個體建構函式的實值類型的執行個體，請使用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>方法。
> [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫端被授與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，如果非公用成員的授權集僅限於呼叫者的授與集或子集合類別。 (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Reflection.MemberTypes MemberType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Reflection.MemberTypes MemberType
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property MemberType As MemberTypes
public: virtual property System::Reflection::MemberTypes MemberType { System::Reflection::MemberTypes get(); };
member this.MemberType : System.Reflection.MemberTypes

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating that this member is a constructor.
Docs.value: 值，表示這個成員為建構函式。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A>。 因此，當您檢查一組<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>物件 — 例如，將所傳回的陣列<xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>—<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Constructor>只有指定的成員時建構函式。
## Examples 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.MemberType%2A>屬性來識別<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>物件做為建構函式。
[!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.param: The instance that created this method.
One of the values that specifies the type of binding.
A that defines a set of properties and enables the binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members using reflection. If binder is , then is used.

An array of objects used to match the number, order, and type of the parameters for this constructor, under the constraints of binder. If this constructor does not require parameters, pass an array with zero elements. Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type. For reference-type elements, this value is . For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or , depending on the specific element type.
A used to govern the coercion of types. If this is , the for the current thread is used.
Docs.summary: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the method.

Docs.summary: Represents the name of the type constructor method as it is stored in metadata. This name is always ".cctor". This property is read-only.
